body: Now that nemesis has control over riko, she can increase the size of riko's boobs, her butt, her thighs, belly, and size. With this, riko becomes the ultimate playtoy for gid.

Riko gets pregnant with gid's child. With her belly now big, gid then marries riko, nemesis still lives within riko's belly, riko stays as a woman because of nemesis's control, and riko acts as the new queen of the galaxy
